message:
So proud of the work Shanika Shay Shay Ampah is doing.

"Ampah came from what everyone thought was a perfect family and made good grades at school but deep inside, she hid a dark secret she couldn’t share with anyone."

data.description: Human trafficking is not on the rise, according to the Palm Beach County State Attorney’s Office. Instead, they say there’s more awareness, and more people than ever before are reporting it.Shanika Ampah, a mother of eight from Miami-Dade County, is a sur
data.title: Human trafficking survivor hopes story will save others
